means: 一对一的，坦率的，人盯人的

sentence.Network_en: He called me to his office for a man-to-man talk.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把我叫到他的办公室私下谈了谈。

sentence.Network_en: Me and Ben should sort this out man to man.
sentence.Network_cn: 我和本应该把这件事坦率地说清楚。
让我们推心置腹地谈谈吧.

list.abs: tamed horse is useful to man .训练过的马对人很有用。

bacon that the only knowledge of importance to man was empirically rooted in the natural world ; and that a clear system of scientific inquiry would assure man's mastery over the world .培根认为，对人类至关重要的学问都历经自然界验证而来，而清晰的科学探究体系终将使人类掌控整个宇宙。

there was just one thing that spoiled Mr. Lin's happiness-completely disregarding his dignity , the local bank had sent its man to collect eighty per cent of the sales proceeds .只有一点，使林先生扫兴；恒源庄毫不顾面子地派人来提取了当天营业总数的八成。
it takes a strong man to save himself and a great man to save anther .坚强的人只能拯救自己，伟大的人才能拯救他人。

sentences.sentence: "had a man-to-man talk about the facts of life"

means.word_mean: 2. being a system of play in which an individual defensive player guards an individual offensive player;
